segments.text: I heard Rose is pregnant . I hope it'll be a boy this time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope so , too.Rose and her husband have been wanting a boy so much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After three baby girls in a row , Rose is under a lot of pressure from her in-laws.They want a boy in the worst way now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But baby girls are just as good and just as fun as baby boys .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree with you , but you know how old-fashioned the elders are .
segments.speaker: S1
